lastfm.name: Kmpfsprt
lastfm.bio: KMPFSPRT were formed in 2010 in Cologne and consist of members from different bands which all used to have quite a name in the German Punk / Hardcore scene: The brothers Richard und Dennis Meyer, both members of Summer's Last Regret and Fire In The Attic, Max Schreiber, Drummer of Days In Grief and Èlysèe and David Schumann of Go As In Gorgeous and also known as author of the book "The Tokyo Diaries". The band is currently recording their first EP. Read more on Last.fm
